attributes.action: The  UK Should  continue to be part of the European  Inter Rail  pass scheme
attributes.background:
The Rail Delivery Group (RDG) has announced its withdrawal from the Inter Rail scheme on 1 January 2020. It will also pull out of Eurail, the parallel scheme for non-EU visitors. 

European travellers and other international visitors  will no loner  be able to visit the UK as part of  Interrail.

rejection.details:
In any case, the Rail Delivery Group has now announced that it will be remaining part of both the Interrail and Eurail passes. You can see the announcement here:

https://www.raildeliverygroup.com/media-centre/press-releases/2019/469775896-2019-08-08.html
